text: Zhenzhu ceng jiayi enchong de zhexie xianzhi, shuyu a dan de houyi, shuyu wo shi (tamen) yu nu ha tongzhougongji zhe de (houyi), shuyu yi bo la xin he yi si la yi de houyi, shuyu wo suo yindao erqie xuanba de ren, dui tamen xuandu zhiren zhu de qishi de shihou, tamen fufu xiaqu koutou he kuqi.â€»
